message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a starting price of $20,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your confidence in the product, Alice, but I'm looking to stay within a tighter budget. I'm willing to pay $12,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your budget constraints, but $12,000 is quite a bit lower than what I'm looking for.  How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Alice, but $17,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $14,000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
